GV05agsas_3u:3: oṃkāranirṇaya uktaḥ prapañcopaśamaḥ śivodvaita ātmeti pratijñāmātreṇa /
GV05agsas_3u:4: jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyata iti ca /
GV05agsas_3u:6: advaitaṃ kimāgamamātreṇa pratipattavyamāhosvittarkeṇāpītyata āha- śakyate tarkeṇāpi jñātum;
GV05agsas_3u:7: tatkathamityadvaitaprakaraṇamārabhyata upāsyopāsānādibhedajātaṃ sarvaṃ vitathaṃ kevalaścātmādvayaḥ paramārtha iti sthitamatīte prakaraṇe; yataḥ-
GV05agsas_3u:9: prāgutpatter ajaṃ sarvaṃ tenāsau kṛpaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_3.1 //
GV05agsas_3u:12: upāsanāśrita upāsanāmātmano mokṣasādhanatvena gata upāsako 'haṃ mamopāsyaṃ brahma /
GV05agsas_3u:13: tadupāsanaṃ kṛtvā jāte brahmaṇīdānīṃ vartamāno 'jaṃ brahma śarīrapātādūrdhvaṃ pratapatsye prāgutpatteścājamidaṃ sarvamahaṃ ca /
GV05agsas_3u:14_0: yadātmako 'haṃ prāgutpatteridānīṃ jāto jāte brahmaṇi ca vartamāna upāsanayā punastadeva
GV05agsas_3u:14_1: pratipatsya ityevamupāsanāśrito dharmaḥ sādhako yenaivaṃ kṣudrabrahmavittenāsau kāraṇena
GV05agsas_3u:16: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsate“(ke.u.1 / 4) ityādiśrutestalavakāraṇām //1//
GV05agsas_3u:19_1: jāto 'haṃ jāte brahmaṇi varte tadupāsanāśritaḥ sanbrahma pratipatsya ityevaṃ pratipannaḥ
GV05agsas_3u:20: ato vakṣyāmy akārpaṇyam ajāti samatāṃ gatam /
GV05agsas_3u:21: yathā na jāyate kiñcij jāyamānaṃ samantataḥ // MandUpK_3.2 //
GV05agsas_3u:28: tadajāti, avidyamānā jātirasya samatāṃ gataṃ sarvasāmyaṃ gatam /
GV05agsas_3u:30: yaddhi sāvayavaṃ vastu tadavayavavaiṣamyaṃ gacchajjāyata ityucyate /
GV05agsas_3u:31: idaṃ tu niravayavatvātsamatāṃ gatamiti na kaiścidavayavaiḥ sphuṭatyatojātyakārpaṇyam /
GV05agsas_3u:32_0: samantataḥ samantādyathā na jāyate kiñcidalpamapi na sphuṭati rajjusarpavadavidyākṛtadṛṣṭyā
GV05agsas_3u:32_1: jāyamānaṃ yena prakāreṇa na jāyate sarvato 'jameva brahma bhavati tathā taṃ prakāraṃ
GV05agsas_3u:38: ghaṭādivac ca saṃghātair jātāv etan nidarśanam // MandUpK_3.3 //
GV05agsas_3u:41: ātmā paro hi yasmādākāśavatsūkṣmo niravayavaḥ sarvagata ākāśavadukto jīvaiḥ kṣetrajñairghaṭākāśairiva ghaṭākāśatulya udita uktaḥ sa evākāśasamaḥ para ātmā /
GV05agsas_3u:42: atha vā ghaṭākāśairyathākāśa udita utpannastathā paro jīvātmabhirutpannaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:43: jīvātmanāṃ parasmādātmana utpattiryā śrūyate vedānteṣu sā mahākāśādghaṭākāśotpattisamā na paramārtha ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:44: tasmādevākāśādghaṭādayaḥ saṃghātā yathetpadyanta evamākāśasthānīyātparamātmanaḥ pṛthivyādibhūtasaṃghātā ādhyātmikāśca kāryakaraṇalakṣaṇā rajjusarpavadvikalpitā jāyante /
GV05agsas_3u:46: yadā mandabuddhipratipādayiṣayā śrutyātmano jātirucyate jīvādīnāṃ tadā jātāvupagamyamānāyāmetannidarśanaṃ dṛṣṭānto yathoditākāśavadityādiḥ //3//
GV05agsas_3u:50: ākāśe saṃpralīyante tadvaj jīvā ihātmani // MandUpK_3.4 //
GV05agsas_3u:54: yathā vā ghaṭādipralaye ghaṭākāśādipralayastadvaddehādisaṃghātotpattyā jīvotpattistatpralaye ca jīvānāmihātmani pralayo na svata ityarthaḥ //4//
GV05agsas_3u:57: sarvadeheṣvātmaikatva ekasmiñjananamaraṇasukhādimatyātmani sarvātmanāṃ tatsambandhaḥ kriyāphalasāṅkaryaṃ ca syāditi ya āhurdvaitinastānpratīdamucyate-
GV05agsas_3u:59: na sarve saṃprayujyante tadvaj jīvāḥ sukhādibhiḥ // MandUpK_3.5 //
GV05agsas_3u:62: yathaikasminghaṭākāśe rajodhūmādibhiryute saṃyukte na sarve ghaṭākāśādayastadrajodhūmādibhiḥ saṃyujyante tadvajjīvāḥ sukhādibhiḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:64: bāḍham; nanu na śrutaṃ tvayākāśavatsarvasaṃghāteṣveka evātmeti?
GV05agsas_3u:65: yadyeka evātmā tarhi sarvatra sukhī duḥkhī ca syāt?
GV05agsas_3u:67: na hi sāṃkhya ātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhādimattvamicchati buddhisamavāyābhyupagamātsukhaduḥkhādīnām /
GV05agsas_3u:69: bhedābhāve pradhānasya pārārthyānupapattiriti cet; na pradhānakṛtasyārthasyātmanyasamavāyāt /
GV05agsas_3u:70: yadi hi pradhākṛto bandho mokṣo vārthaḥ puruṣeṣu bhedena samavaiti tataḥ pradhānasya pārārthyamātmaikatve nopapadyata iti yuktā puruṣabhedakalpanā /
GV05agsas_3u:71: na ca sākhyairbandho mokṣo vārthaḥ puruṣasamaveto 'bhyupagamyate /
GV05agsas_3u:73: ataḥ puruṣasattāmātraprayuktameva pradhānasya pārārthyaṃ siddhaṃ na tu puruṣabhedaprayuktamiti /
GV05agsas_3u:74: ataḥ puruṣabhedakalpanāyāṃ na pradhānasya pārārthyaṃ hetuḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:76: parasattāmātrameva caitannimittīkṛtya svayaṃ badhyate mucyate ca pradhānam /
GV05agsas_3u:77: paraścopalabdhimātrasattāsvarūpeṇa pradhānapravṛttau heturnakenacidviśeṣeṇeti kevalamūḍhatayaiva puruṣabhedakalpanā vedārthaparityāgaśca /
GV05agsas_3u:78: ye tvāhurvaiśeṣikādaya icchādaya ātmasamavāyina iti, tadapyasat /
GV05agsas_3u:82: na ca bhinnajātīyānāṃ sparśādihīnānāmātmanāṃ mana ādibhiḥ saṃbandho yuktaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:83: na ca dravyādrūpādayo guṇāḥ karmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyā vā bhinnāḥ santi pareṣām /
GV05agsas_3u:84: yadi hyatyantabhinnā eva dravyātsyuricchādayaścātmanastathā ca sati dravyeṇa teṣāṃ sambandānupapattiḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:85: ayutasiddhānāṃ samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho na virudhyata iti cet, na /
GV05agsas_3u:90: samavāyasya ca dravyādanyatve sati dravyeṇa sambandhāntaraṃ vācyaṃ yathā dravyaguṇayoḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:91: samavāyo nityasambandha eveti na vācyamiti cettathā ca samavāyasambandhavatāṃ nityasambandhaprasaṅgātpṛthaktvānupapatti /
GV05agsas_3u:95: yathā tvākāśasyāvidyādhyāropitarajodhūmamalavatvādidoṣavatvaṃ tathātmano 'vidyādhyāropitabuddhyādyupādhikṛtasukhaduḥkhādidoṣavatve bandhamokṣādayo vyavahārikā na virudhyante /
GV05agsas_3u:100: kathaṃ punarātmabhedanimitta iva vyavahāra ekasminnātmanyavidyākṛta upapadyata iti, ucyate-
GV05agsas_3u:101: rūpakāryasamākhyāś ca bhidyante tatra tatra vai /
GV05agsas_3u:102: ākāśasya na bhedo 'sti tadvaj jīveṣu nirṇayaḥ // MandUpK_3.6 //
GV05agsas_3u:107: sarvo 'yamākāśo rūpādibhedakṛto vyavahāro na paramārtha eva /
GV05agsas_3u:110: yathaitattadveddahopādhibhedakṛteṣu jīveṣu ghaṭākāśasthānīyeṣvātmasu nirūpaṇātkṛto buddhimadbhirnirṇayo niścaya ityarthaḥ //6//
GV05agsas_3u:113: nanu tatra paramārthakṛta eva ghaṭākāśādiṣu rūpakāryādibhedavyavahāra iti? naitadasti, yasmāt
GV05agsas_3u:115: naivātmanaḥ sadā jīvo vikārāvayavau tathā // MandUpK_3.7 //
GV05agsas_3u:121_0: na tathā0kāśasya ghaṭākāśo vikārāvayavau yathā tathā naivātmanaḥ parasya paramārthasato
GV05agsas_3u:121_1: mahākāśasthānīyasya ghaṭākāśasthānīyo jīvaḥ sadā sarvadā yathoktadṛṣṭāntavanna vikāro nāpyavayavaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:126: tasmāttatkṛtameva kleśakarmaphalamalavatvamātmano na paramārthata ityetamarthaṃ dṛṣṭāntena pratipipādayiṣannāha-
GV05agsas_3u:127: yathā bhavati bālānāṃ gaganaṃ malinaṃ malaiḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:128: tathā bhavaty abuddhānām ātmāpi malino malaiḥ // MandUpK_3.8 //
GV05agsas_3u:131: yathā bhavati loke bālānāmavivekināṃ gaganamākāśaṃ ghanarajodhūmādimalārmalinaṃ malavanna gaganaṃ malavadyāthātmyavivekinām,
GV05agsas_3u:132: tathā bhavatyātmā paro 'pi yo vijñātā pratyakkleśakarmaphalamalairmalino 'buddhānāṃ pratyagātmavivakerahitānāṃ nātmavivekavatām /
GV05agsas_3u:145: ādhikye sarvasāmye vā nopapattir hi vidyate // MandUpK_3.10 //
GV05agsas_3u:149: ātmano māyāvidyā tayā pratyupasthāpitā na paramārthataḥ santītyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:150: yadyādhikyamadhikabhāvastirgdehādyapekṣayā devādikāryakaraṇasaṃghātānāṃ yadi vā sarveṣāṃ samataiva naiṣāmupapattiḥ sambhavaḥ sadbhāpratipādako heturvidyate nāsti,
GV05agsas_3u:151: hi yasmāttasmādavidyākṛtā eva na paramārthataḥ santītyarthaḥ //10//
GV05agsas_3u:155: rasādayo hi ye kośā vyākhyātās taittirīyake /
GV05agsas_3u:156: teṣām ātmā paro jīvaḥ khaṃ yathā saṃprakāśitaḥ // MandUpK_3.11 //
GV05agsas_3u:159_0: rasādayo 'nnarasamayaḥ prāṇamaya ityevamādayaḥ kośā iva kośā asyāderivottarottarasyāpekṣayā
GV05agsas_3u:159_2: teṣāṃ kośānāmātmā yenātmanā pañcāpi kośā ātmavanto 'ntaratamena,
GV05agsas_3u:161: ko 'sāvityāha-para evātmā yaḥ pūrvam“satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma“(tai.u.2 / 1) iti prakṛtaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:162: yasmādātmanaḥ spapnamāyādivadākāśādikrameṇa rasādayaḥ kośalakṣaṇāḥ saṃghātā ātmamāyāvisarjitā ityuktam /
GV05agsas_3u:163: sa ātmāsmābhiryathā khaṃ tatheti saṃprakāśitaḥ“ātmā hyākāśavat“(advaita.3) ityādiślaukaiḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:167: dvayor dvayor madhujñāne paraṃ brahma prakāśitam /
GV05agsas_3u:171: kiṃ cādhidaivamadhyātmaṃ ca tejomayo 'mṛtamayaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛthivyādyantargato yo vijñātā para evātmā brahma sarvamiti dvayordvayorādvaitakṣayātparaṃ brahma prakāśitam /
GV05agsas_3u:172: kvetyāha- brahmavidyākhyaṃ madhvamṛtamamṛtatvaṃ modanahetutvādvijñāyate yasminniti madhujñānaṃ madhubrāhmaṇaṃ tasminnityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:173: kimivetyāha-pṛthivyāmudare caiva yathaika ākāśo 'numānena prakāśito loke tadvadityarthaḥ //12//
GV05agsas_3u:177: nānātvaṃ nindyate yac ca tad evaṃ hi samañjasam // MandUpK_3.13 //
GV05agsas_3u:180: yadyuktitaḥ śrutitaśca nirdhāritaṃ jīvasya parasya cātmano jīvātmanoranyatvamabhedena praśasyate stūyateśāstreṇa vyāsādibhiśca /
GV05agsas_3u:181: yacca sarvaprāṇisādhāraṇaṃ svābāvikaṃ śāstrabahiṣkṛtaiḥ kutārkikairviracitaṃ nānātvadarśanaṃ nindyate“na tu taddvītīyamasti“(bṛ.u.4 / 3 / 23)
GV05agsas_3u:185: “mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati“(ka.u.2 / 1 / 10)
GV05agsas_3u:188: yāstu tārkikaparikalpitāḥ kudṛṣṭayastā anṛjvyo nirūpyamāṇā na ghaṭanāṃ prāñcantītyabhiprāyaḥ //13//
GV05agsas_3u:192: bhaviṣyadvṛtyā gauṇaṃ tan mukhyatvaṃ hi na yujyate // MandUpK_3.14 //
GV05agsas_3u:195: nanu śrutyāpi jīvaparamātmanoḥ pṛthaktvaṃ yatprāgutpatterutpatyarthopaniṣadvākyebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ prakīrtitaṃ karmakāṇḍe 'nekaśaḥ kāmabhedata idaṅkāmo 'daḥkāma iti;
GV05agsas_3u:198: tatra kathaṃ karmajñānakāṇḍavākyavirodhe jñānakāṇḍavākyārthasyaivaikatvasya sāmañjasyamavadhāryata iti?
GV05agsas_3u:204: ityādyutpattyarthopaniṣadvākyebhyaḥ prākpṛthaktvaṃ karmakāṇḍe prakīrtitiṃ yattanna paramārtham /
GV05agsas_3u:211: ata upaniṣatsv ekatvaṃ śrutyā pratipādayiṣitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhāvinīmekavṛttimāśritya loke bhedadṛṣṭyanuvādo gauṇa evetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:217: ityekatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti tāṃ bhaviṣyadvṛttipekṣya yajjīvātmanoḥ pṛthaktvaṃ yatra kvacidvākye gamyamānaṃ tadgauṇam,
GV05agsas_3u:221: nanu yadyutpatteḥ prāgajaṃ sarvamekamevādvitīyaṃ tathāpyutpatterūrdhvaṃ jātamidaṃ sarvaṃ jīvāśca bhinnā iti,
GV05agsas_3u:223: pūrvamapi parihṛtya evāyaṃ doṣaḥ svapnavadātmamāyāvisarjitāḥ saṃghātā ghaṭākāśotpattibhedādivajjīvānāmutpattibhedādiriti /
GV05agsas_3u:226: upāyaḥ so 'vatārāya nāsti bhedaḥ kathañcana // MandUpK_3.15 //
GV05agsas_3u:229: mṛllokavisphuliṅgādidṛṣṭāntopanyāsaiḥ sṛṣṭiryā coditā prakāśitānyathānyathā ca sa sarvaḥ sṛṣṭiprakāro jīvaparamātmaikatvabuddhyavatārayopāyo 'smākam /
GV05agsas_3u:233: yadi hi saṃvādaḥ paramārtha evābhūdekarūpa eva saṃvādaḥ sarvaśākhāsvaśroṣyata viruddhānekaprakāreṇa nāśroṣyata /
GV05agsas_3u:244: yadi para evātmā nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāva ekaḥ paramārthaḥ san“ekamevādvitīyam” (chā.u.6 / 2 / 2)
GV05agsas_3u:256: na cātmaika evādvitīya iti niścitottamadṛṣṭyarthaṃ dayālunā vedenānukampayā sanmārgagāḥ santaḥ kathamimāmuttamāmekatvadṛṣṭiṃ prāpnuyuriti /
GV05agsas_3u:258: tadeva brhama tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsate“(ke.u.1 / 4)
GV05agsas_3u:268: parasparaṃ virudhyante tairayaṃ na virudhyate // MandUpK_3.17 //
GV05agsas_3u:272_0: evamevaiṣa paramārtho nānyatheti tatra tatrānuraktāḥ pratipakṣaṃ cātmanaḥ paśyantastaṃ
GV05agsas_3u:272_1: dviṣanta ityevaṃ rāgadveṣopetāḥ svasiddhāntadarśananimittam eva parasparamanyonyaṃ virudhyante /
GV05agsas_3u:273: tairanyonyavirodhibhirasmadīyo 'yaṃ vaidikaḥ sarvānanyatvādātmaikatvadarśanapakṣo na virudhyate yathā svahastapādādibhiḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:278: advaitaṃ paramārtho hi dvaitaṃ tadbheda ucyate /
GV05agsas_3u:279: teṣām ubhayathā dvaitaṃ tenāyaṃ na viruddhyate // MandUpK_3.18 //
GV05agsas_3u:282: advaitaṃ paramārtho hi yasmādadvaitaṃ nānātvaṃ tasyādvaitasya bhedastadbhedastasya kāryamityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:285: iti śruterūpapatteśca svacittaspandanābhāve samādhau mūrchāyāṃ suṣuptau cābhāvāt /
GV05agsas_3u:292: yathā mattagajārūḍha unmattaṃ bhūmiṣṭhaṃ prati gajārūḍhohaṃ gajaṃ vāhaya māṃ pratīti bruvāṇamapi taṃ prati na vāhayatyavirodhabuddhyā tadvat /
GV05agsas_3u:297: dvaitamadvaitabheda ityukte dvaitamapyadvaitavatparamārthasaditi syāt kasyacidāśaṅketyata āha-
GV05agsas_3u:298: māyayā bhidyate hy etan nānyathājaṃ kathañcana /
GV05agsas_3u:299: tattvato bhidyamāne hi martyatām amṛtaṃ vrajet // MandUpK_3.19 //
GV05agsas_3u:302: yatparamārthasadadvaitaṃ māyayā bhidyate hyetacaimirikānekacandravadrajjuḥ sarpadhārādibhirbhedairiva na paramārthato niravayavatvādātmanaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:305: tasmānniravayavamajaṃ nānpathā kathañcana kenacidapi prakāreṇa na bhidyata ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:306: tattvato bhidyamāne hyamṛtamajamadvayaṃ svabhāvataḥ sanmartyatāṃ vrajet; yathāgniḥ śītatām /
GV05agsas_3u:313: ajāto hy amṛto bhāvo martyatāṃ katham eṣyati // MandUpK_3.20 //
GV05agsas_3u:316_0: ye tu punaḥ kecidupaniṣadvyākhyātāro brahmavādino vāvadūkā ajātasyaivātmatattvasya
GV05agsas_3u:316_1: amṛtasya svabhāvato jātim utpattimicchanti paramārthata eva teṣāṃ jātaṃ cettadeva
GV05agsas_3u:317: sa cājāto hyamṛto bhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ sannātmā kathaṃ martyatāmeṣyati?
GV05agsas_3u:322: na bhavaty amṛtaṃ martyaṃ na martyam amṛtaṃ tathā /
GV05agsas_3u:323: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_3.21 //
GV05agsas_3u:327: tataḥ prakṛteḥ svabhāvasyānyathābhāvaḥ svataḥ pracyutirna kathañcidbhaviṣyati,
GV05agsas_3u:332: kṛtakenāmṛtas tasya kathaṃ sthāsyati niścalaḥ // MandUpK_3.22 //
GV05agsas_3u:335: yasya punarvādinaḥ svabhāvenā7mṛto bhāvo martyatāṃ gacchati paramārthato jāyate tasya prāgutpatteḥ sa bhāvaḥ svabhāvato 'mṛta iti pratijñā mṛṣaiva /
GV05agsas_3u:337: kṛtakenāmṛtaḥ sa kathaṃ sthāsyati niścalo 'mṛtasvabhāvastathā na kathañcitsthāsyatyātmajātivādinaḥ sarvadājaṃ nāma nāstyeva;
GV05agsas_3u:343: bāḍhaṃ vidyate sṛṣṭipratipādikā śrutiḥ; sā tvanyaparā /
GV05agsas_3u:347: niścitaṃ yuktiyuktaṃ ca yat tad bhavati netarat // MandUpK_3.23 //
GV05agsas_3u:350: bhūtataḥ paramārthataḥ sṛjyamāne vastunyabhūtato māyayā vā māyāvineva sṛjyamāne vastuni samā tulyā sṛṣṭiśrutiḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:353: avidyāsṛṣṭaviṣayaiva sarvā gauṇī mukhyā ca sṛṣṭirna paramārthataḥ“sabāhyābhyantaro hyajaḥ“(mu.u.2 / 1 / 2) iti śruteḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:354: tasmācchrutyā niścitaṃ yadekamevādvitīyamajamamṛtamiti yuktiyuktaṃ ca yuktyā ca sampannaṃ tadevetyavocāma pūrvairgranthaiḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:359: neha nāneti cāmnāyād indro māyābhir ity api /
GV05agsas_3u:360: ajāyamāno bahudhā māyayā jāyate tu saḥ // MandUpK_3.24 //
GV05agsas_3u:363: yadi hi bhūtata eva sṛṣṭiḥ syāttataḥ satyameva nānā vastviti tadabhāvapradarśanārthamāmnāyo na syāt /
GV05agsas_3u:364: asti ca“neha nānāsti kiñcana“(ka.u.2 / 1 / 11) ityādirāmnāyo dvaitabhāvapratiṣedhārthaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:372: na hyajāyamānatvaṃ bahudhā janmacaikatra sambhavati, agnāviva śaityamoṣṇyaṃ ca /
GV05agsas_3u:373: phalavatvāccātmaikatvadarśanameva śrutiniścitor'thaḥ“tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ“(ī.u.7)
GV05agsas_3u:379: ko nv enaṃ janayed iti kāraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate // MandUpK_3.25 //
GV05agsas_3u:384: na hi paramārthataḥ saṃbhūtāyāṃ saṃbhūtau tadapavāda upapadyate /
GV05agsas_3u:387: satyameva devatādarśanasya saṃbhūtiviṣayasya vināśaśabdavācyasya karmaṇaḥ samuccayavidhānārthaḥ saṃbhūtyapavādaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:389: evaṃ hyeṣaṇādvayarūpānmṛtyoraśuddherviyuktaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ syādato mṛtyoratitaraṇārthādevatādarśanakarmasamuccayalakṣaṇā hyavidyā /
GV05agsas_3u:391: ato 'nyārthatvādamṛtatvasādhanaṃ brahmavidyāmapokṣya nindārthaṃ eva bhavati saṃbhūtyapavādaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:393: ata eva saṃbhūter apavādātsaṃbhūterāpekṣikameva sattvamiti paramārthasadātmaikatvamapekṣya amṛtākhyaḥ saṃbhavaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GV05agsas_3u:394: evaṃ māyānirmitasyaiva jīvasyāvidyayā pratyupasthāpitasyāvidyānāśe svabhāvarūpatvātparamārthataḥ ko nvenaṃ janayet /
GV05agsas_3u:395: na hi rajjvāmavidyāropitaṃ sarpaṃ punarvivekato naṣṭaṃ janayetkaścit /
GV05agsas_3u:396: tathā na kaścidenaṃ janayediti ko nvityākṣepārthatvātkāraṇaṃ pritaṣidhyate /
GV05agsas_3u:397: avidyodbhūtasya naṣṭasya janayitṛkāraṇaṃ na kiñcidastītyabhiprāyaḥ“nāyaṃ kutaścinna babhūva kaścit“(ka.u.1 / 2 / 18) iti śruteḥ //25//
GV05agsas_3u:400: sa eṣa neti netīti vyākhyātaṃ nihnute yataḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:405: iti pratipāditasyātmano durbodhyatvaṃ manyamānā śrutiḥ punaḥ punarupāyāntaratvena tasyaiva pratipipādayiṣayā yadvyākhyātaṃ tatsarvaṃ nihnate,
GV05agsas_3u:407: arthāt“sa eṣa neti neti“(bṛ.u.3 / 1 / 26) ityātmano 'dṛśyatāṃ darśayantī śrutiḥ
GV05agsas_3u:408: upāyasyopeyaniṣṭhatāmajānata upāyatvena vyākhyātasyopeyavadgrāhyatā mā bhūdityagrāhyabhāvena hetunā kāraṇena nihnuta ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:409: tataścaivamupāyasyopeyaniṣṭhatāmeva jānata upeyasya ca nityaikarūpatvamiti tasyasabāhyābhyantaramajamātmatattvaṃ prakāśate svayameva //26//
GV05agsas_3u:412: evaṃ hi śrutivākyaśataiḥ sabāhyābhyantaramajamātmatattvamadvayaṃ na tato 'nyadastīti niścitametat /
GV05agsas_3u:414: sato hi māyayā janma yujyate na tu tattvataḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:415: tattvato jāyate yasya jātaṃ tasya hi jāyate // MandUpK_3.27 //
GV05agsas_3u:420: yathā sato māyāvino māyayā janma kāryam /
GV05agsas_3u:421: evaṃ jagato janma kāryaṃ gṛhyamāṇaṃ māyāvinamiva paramārthasantam ātmānaṃ jagajjanmamāyāspadam avagamayati /
GV05agsas_3u:422: yasmātsato hi vidyamānātkāraṇānmāyānirmitasya hastyādikāryasyeva jagajjanma yujyate nāsataḥ kāraṇāt /
GV05agsas_3u:423: na tu tattvata evātmano janma yujyate /
GV05agsas_3u:424: atha vā sato vidyamānasya vastuno rajjvādeḥ sarpādivan māyayā janma yujyate na tu tattvato yathā tathāgrāhyasyāpi sata evātmano rajjusarpavajjagadrūpeṇa māyayā janma yujyate /
GV05agsas_3u:426: yasya punaḥ paramārthasadajamātmatattvaṃ jagadrūpeṇa jāyate vādino nahi tasyājaṃ jāyata iti śakyaṃ vaktuṃ virodhāt /
GV05agsas_3u:431: asato māyayā janma tattvato naiva yujyate /
GV05agsas_3u:432: vandhyāputro na tattvena māyayā vāpi jāyate // MandUpK_3.28 //
GV05agsas_3u:435: asadvādināmasato bhāvasya māyayā tattvato vā na kathañcana janma yujyate, adṛṣṭatvāt /
GV05agsas_3u:436: na hi vandhyāputro māyayā tattvato vā jāyate tasmādatrāsadvādo dūrata evānupapanne7tyarthaḥ //28//
GV05agsas_3u:440: yathā svapne dvayābhāsaṃ spandate māyayā manaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:441: tathā jāgraddvayābhāsaṃ spandate māyayā manaḥ // MandUpK_3.29 //
GV05agsas_3u:444: yathā rajjvāṃ vikalpitaḥ sarpo rajjurūpeṇāvekṣyamāṇaḥ sannevaṃ manaḥ paramārthavijñaptyātmarūpeṇāvekṣyamāṇaṃ sad grāhyagrāhakarūpeṇa dvayābhāsaṃ spandate svapne māyayā,
GV05agsas_3u:446: tathā tadvadeva jāgrajjāgarite spandate māyayā manaḥ spandata ivetyarthaḥ //29//
GV05agsas_3u:449: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ manaḥ svapne na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:450: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ tathā jāgran na saṃśayaḥ // MandUpK_3.30 //
GV05agsas_3u:453: rajjurūpeṇa sarpa iva paramārthata ātmarūpeṇādvayaṃ saddvayābhāsaṃ manaḥ svapne na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:454: na hi svapne hastyādi grāhyaṃ tadgrāhakaṃ vā cakṣurādidvayaṃ vijñānavyatirekeṇāsti /
GV05agsas_3u:462: manodṛśyam idaṃ dvaitaṃ yat kiñcit sacarācaram /
GV05agsas_3u:463: manaso hy amanībhāve dvaitaṃ naivopalabhyate // MandUpK_3.31 //
GV05agsas_3u:466: tena hi manasā vikalpyamānena dṛśyaṃ manodṛśyamidaṃ dvaitaṃ sarvaṃ mana iti pratijñā /
GV05agsas_3u:468: manaso hyamanībhāve nirodhe vivekadarśanābhyāsavairāgyābhyāṃ rajjvāmiva sarpe layaṃ gate vā suṣupte dvaitaṃ naivopalabhyata ityabhāvātsiddhaṃ dvaitasyāsatvamityarthaḥ //31//
GV05agsas_3u:473: amanastāṃ tadā yāti grāhyābhāve tadagraham // MandUpK_3.32 //
GV05agsas_3u:476: ātmaiva satyamātmasatyaṃ mṛttikāvat“vācāraṃbhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam“(chā.u.6 / 1 / 4)
GV05agsas_3u:484: yadyasadidaṃ dvaitaṃ kena svamajamātmatattvaṃ vibudhyate? ity ucyate-
GV05agsas_3u:486: brahma jñeyam ajaṃ nityam ajenājaṃ vibudhyate // MandUpK_3.33 //
GV05agsas_3u:489: akalpakaṃ sarvakalpanāvarjitamata evājaṃ jñānaṃ jñaptimātraṃ jñeyena paramārthasatā brahmaṇābhinnaṃ pracakṣate kathayanti brahmavidaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:492: tasyaiva viśeṣaṇaṃ brahma jñeyaṃ yasya svasya tadidaṃ brahmajñeyamauṣṇyasyevāgnivadabhinnam /
GV05agsas_3u:494: nityaprakāśasvarūpa iva savitā nityavijñānaikarasaghanatvānna jñānāntaramapekṣata ityarthaḥ //33//
GV05agsas_3u:497: ātmasatyānubodhena saṅkalpamakurvadbāhyaviṣayābhāve nirindhanāgnivatpraśāntaṃ nigṛhītaṃ niruddhaṃ mano bhavatītyuktam /
GV05agsas_3u:501: pracāraḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ suṣupte 'nyo na tatsamaḥ // MandUpK_3.34 //
GV05agsas_3u:504: nigṛhītasya niruddhasya manaso nirvikalpasya sarvakalpanāvarjitasya dhīmato vivekavataḥ pracāro yaḥ sa tu pracāro viśeṣeṇa jñeyo yogibhiḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:505: nanu sarvapratyayābhāve yādṛśaḥ suṣuptasthasya manasaḥ pracārastādṛśa eva niruddhasyāpi pratyayābhāvāviśeṣātkiṃ tatra vijñeyamiti /
GV05agsas_3u:513: līyate hi suṣupte tan nigṛhītaṃ na līyate /
GV05agsas_3u:514: tad eva nirbhayaṃ brahma jñānalokaṃ samantataḥ // MandUpK_3.35 //
GV05agsas_3u:517_1: bījabhāvamāpadyate tadvivekavijñānapūrvakaṃ niruddhaṃ nigṛhītaṃ sanna līyate tamobījabhāvaṃ nāpadyate /
GV05agsas_3u:519: yathā grāhyagrāhakāvidyākṛtamaladvayavarjitaṃ tadā paramadvayaṃ brahmaiva tatsaṃvṛttamityatastadeva nirbhayaṃ dvaitagrahaṇasya bhayanimittasyābhāvat /
GV05agsas_3u:521: tadeva viśeṣyate jñāptirjñānamātmasvabhāvacaitanyaṃ tadeva jñānamālokaḥ prākāśo yasya tadbrahma jñānālokaṃ vijñānaikarasaghanamityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:535: prabodhācca te rajjusarpavadvinaṣṭha iti na nāmnābhidhīyate brahma rūpyate vā na kenacitprakāreṇetyanāmakarūpakaṃ ca tat /
GV05agsas_3u:537: kiṃ ca sakṛdvibhātaṃ sadaiva vibhātaṃ sadā bhārūpamagrahaṇānyathāgrahaṇāvirbhāvatirobhāvavarjitatvāt /
GV05agsas_3u:538: grahaṇāgrahaṇe hi rātryahanī tamaścāvidyālakṣaṇaṃ sadāprabhātatve kāraṇam /
GV05agsas_3u:540: ata eva sarvaṃ ca tajjñasvarūpaṃ ceti sarvajñam /
GV05agsas_3u:554: cintyate 'nayeti cintā buddhistasyāḥ samutthito 'ntaḥ karaṇavarjita ityarthaḥ“aprāṇo hyamanāḥ śubhro hyakṣarātparataḥ paraḥ” (mu.u.2 / 1 / 2) ityādiśruteḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:564: graho na tatra notsargaś cintā yatra na vidyate /
GV05agsas_3u:565: ātmasaṃsthaṃ tadā jñānam ajāti samatāṃ gatam // MandUpK_3.38 //
GV05agsas_3u:568: na tatra tasminbrahmaṇi graho grahaṇamupādānam, notsarga utsarjanaṃ hānaṃ vā vidyate /
GV05agsas_3u:569: yatra hi vikriyā tadviṣayatvaṃ vā tatra hānopādāne syātāṃ na taddvayamiha brahmaṇi saṃbhavati /
GV05agsas_3u:573: sarvaprakāraiva cintā na saṃbhavati yatrāmanastvātkutastatra hānopādāna ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:577: yadādau pratijñātamato vakṣyāmyakārpaṇyamajāti samatāṃ gatamitīdaṃ tadupapattitaḥ śāstrataścoktamupasaṃhriyate,
GV05agsas_3u:579: etasmādātmasatyānubodhātkārpaṇyaviṣayamanyat“yo vai9tadakṣaraṃ gārgyaviditvāsmāllaukātpraiti sa kṛpaṇaḥ“(bṛ.u.3 / 8 / 10) iti śruteḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:585: yogino bibhyati hy asmād abhaye bhayadarśinaḥ // MandUpK_3.39 //
GV05agsas_3u:588: asparśayogo nāmāyaṃ sarvasaṃbandhākhyasparśavarjitatvādasparśayogo nāma vai smaryate prasiddhamupaniṣatsu /
GV05agsas_3u:589: duḥkhena dṛśyata iti durdarśaḥ sarvairyogibhir vedāntavihitavijñānarahitaiḥ sarvayogibhiḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:591: yogino bibhyati hyasmātsarvabhayavarjitādapyātmanāśarūpamimaṃ yogaṃ manyamānā bhayaṃ kurvanty abhaye 'sminbhayadarśino bhayanimittātmanāśadarśanaśīlā avivekina ityarthaḥ //39//
GV05agsas_3u:594_0: yeṣāṃ punarbrahmasvarūpavyatirekeṇa rajjusarpavat kalpitameva mana indriyādi ca na
GV05agsas_3u:594_1: paramārthato vidyate teṣāṃ brahmasvarūpāṇāmabhayaṃ mokṣākhyā cākṣayā śāntiḥ svabhāvata
GV05agsas_3u:595: ye tvato 'nye yogino mārgagā hīnamadhyamadṛṣṭayo mano 'nyadātmavyatiriktamātsaṃbandhi paśyanti teṣāmātmasatyānubodharahitānām-
GV05agsas_3u:597: duḥkhakṣayaḥ prabodhaś cāpy akṣayā śāntir eva ca // MandUpK_3.40 //
GV05agsas_3u:601: kiṃ ca duḥkhakṣayo 'pi, na hyātmasaṃbandhini manasi pracalite duḥkhakṣayo 'sty avivekinām /
GV05agsas_3u:607: manaso nigrahas tadvad bhaved aparikhedataḥ // MandUpK_3.41 //
GV05agsas_3u:615: suprasannaṃ laye caiva yathā kāmo layas tathā // MandUpK_3.42 //
GV05agsas_3u:618: aparikhinnavyavasāyavānsan vakṣyamāṇenopāyena kāmabhogaviṣayeṣu vikṣiptaṃ mano nigṛhṇīyānnirundhyādātmanyevetyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:619: kiṃ ca līyate 'sminniti suṣupto layastasmiṃllaye ca suprasannam āyāsavarjitaṃ apī7tyetat,
GV05agsas_3u:628: ajaṃ sarvamanusmṛtya jātaṃ naiva tu paśyati // MandUpK_3.43 //
GV05agsas_3u:631: sarvaṃ dvaitamavidyāvijṛmbhitaṃ duḥkhamevetyanusmṛtya kāmabhogātkāmanimitto bhoga icchāviṣayastasmādviprasṛtaṃ mano nivartayedvairāgyabhāvanayetyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:632: ajaṃ brahmasarvamityetacchāstrācāryopadeśato 'nusmṛtya tadviparītaṃ dvaitajātaṃ naiva tu paśyati, abhāvāt //43//
GV05agsas_3u:635: laye saṃbodhayec cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ śamayet punaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:636: sakaṣāyaṃ vijānīyāt samaprāptaṃ na cālayet // MandUpK_3.44 //
GV05agsas_3u:639: evamanena jñānābhyāsavairāgyadvayopāyena laye suṣupte līnaṃ saṃbodhayenmana ātmavivekadarśanena yojayet /
GV05agsas_3u:642: eva punaḥ punarabhyasyato layātsaṃbodhitaṃ viṣayebhyaśca vyāvartitaṃ nāpi sāmyāpannamantarālāvasthaṃ sakaṣāyaṃ sarāgaṃ bījasaṃyuktaṃ mana iti vijānīyāt /
GV05agsas_3u:648: nāsvādayet sukhaṃ tatra niḥsaṅgaḥ prajñayā bhavet /
GV05agsas_3u:649: niścalaṃ niścarac cittam ekīkuryāt prayatnataḥ // MandUpK_3.45 //
GV05agsas_3u:652: samādhitsato yogino yatsukhaṃ jāyate tannākhādayet, tatra na rajyetetyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:654: niḥsaṅgo niḥspṛhaḥ prajñayā vivekabuddhyā yadupalabhyate sukhaṃ tadavidyāparikalpitaṃ mṛṣaiveti vibhāvayet /
GV05agsas_3u:656: yathā punaḥ sukharāgānnivṛttaṃ niścalasvabhāvaṃ sanniścaradbahirnirgacchadbhavati cittaṃ tatastato niyamyoktopāyenātmanyevaikīkuryātprayatnataḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:660: yadā na līyate cittaṃ na ca vikṣipyate punaḥ /
GV05agsas_3u:661: aniṅganam anābhāsaṃ niṣpannaṃ brahma tat tadā // MandUpK_3.46 //
GV05agsas_3u:664: yathoktopāyena nigṛhītaṃ cittaṃ yadā suṣuöe na Öīyatena ca punarviṣayeṣuvikṣipyate,
GV05agsas_3u:667: yadaivaṃlakṣaṇaṃ cittaṃ tadā niṣpannaṃ brahma bahmasvarūpeṇa niṣpannaṃ cittaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ //46//
GV05agsas_3u:670: svasthaṃ śāntaṃ sanirvāṇam akathyaṃ sukham uttamam /
GV05agsas_3u:671: ajam ajena jñeyena sarvajñaṃ paricakṣate // MandUpK_3.47 //
GV05agsas_3u:676: sanirvāṇaṃ nirvṛtinirmāṇaṃ kaivalyaṃ saha nirvāṇena vartate,
GV05agsas_3u:681: ajenānutpannena jñeyenāvyatiriktaṃ satsvena sarvajñarūpeṇa sarvajñaṃ brahmaiva sukhaṃ paricakṣate kathayanti brahmavidaḥ //47//
GV05agsas_3u:684: sarvo 'pyayaṃ manonigrahādirmṛllohādivatsṛṣṭirupāsanā coktā paramārthasvarūpapratipatyupāyatvena na paramārthasatyeti /
GV05agsas_3u:686: na kaścij jāyate jīvaḥ saṃbhavo 'sya na vidyate /
GV05agsas_3u:687: etat tad uttamaṃ satyaṃ yatra kiñcin na jāyate // MandUpK_3.48 //
GV05agsas_3u:690: na kaścijjāyate jīvaḥ kartā bhoktā ca notpadyate kenacidapi prakāreṇa /
GV05agsas_3u:691: ataḥ svabhāvato 'jasyāsyaikasyātmanaḥ saṃbhavaḥ kāraṇaṃ na vidyate nāsti /
GV05agsas_3u:692: yasmānna vidyate 'sya kāraṇaṃ tasmānna kaścijjāyate jīva ityetat /
GV05agsas_3u:693: pūrveṣūpāyatvenoktānāṃ satyānāmetattaduttamaṃ satyaṃ yasminsatyasvarūpe brahmaṇyaṇumātramapi kiñcinna jāyata iti //48//
